snippet: Lionel Messi scored a hat trick as Barcelona opened its Champions League campaign with a dominant 4-0 win over visiting Ajax.
abstract: Barcelona defeats Ajax, 4-0, in soccer's Champion League.
lead_paragraph: Lionel Messi scored a hat trick as Barcelona opened its Champions League campaign with a dominant 4-0 win over visiting Ajax.

headline.main: Messi Scores Hat Trick as Barcelona Cruises
headline.print_headline: Messi Scores Hat Trick As Barcelona Cruises
